      • isPriceValid

        public boolean isPriceValid(double price)
                     throws ToyStoreException
        Validation class that uses the created ToyStoreException class to throw error message if the price is negative
        Parameters:
        price - the price the user inputed for the toy
        Returns:
        valid the boolean value of validity
        Throws:
        ToyStoreException - exception class used to throw exception

      • isPlayerValid

        public boolean isPlayerValid(int min,
                             int max)
                      throws ToyStoreException
        Validation class that uses the created ToyStoreException class to throw error message if minimum is greater than maximum
        Parameters:
        min - the minimum number of players user inputed for toy
        max - the maximum number of players user inputed for toy
        Returns:
        valid the boolean value of validity
        Throws:
        ToyStoreException - exception class used to throw exception
